dct_description_sm: di D. Ruberto Dudleo Duca di Nortumbria, e conte di Warwich.

2nd edition of Dudley's sea atlas. Vol 1 Bk  1 deals with longitude, Vol 1 Bk 2 with chart errors and has 15 charts, Vol 1 Bk 3 with naval issues, Vol 1 Bk 4 with naval architec & ship design, Vol 1 Bk 5 with navagation. Vol 2 includes 131 maps.
Title page of v.1 bk. 1 includes an engraving of an instrument for measuring the ebb & flow of tides; v. 2 includes an illustration of a creature and "Orsa Minore".
First nautical chart by an Englishman, and first atlas with charts on Mercator projection.
dct_publisher_sm: Nella Nuova Stamperia, per Giuseppe Cocchini, All'Insegna della Stella. Ad istanza di Iacopo Bagnoni, & Antonfrancesco Lucini
